## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

![Elephant](https://images.fineartamerica.com/images/artworkimages/mediumlarge/3/babar-nostalgia-prints.jpg){#fig-elephant}

See @fig-elephant for an illustration.

```{r}
#| label: fig-penguins
#| fig-cap: "Plot1"
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)

ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = body_mass_g)) + geom_histogram(aes(fill = species), alpha = 0.5, position = "identity") + scale_fill_manual(values = c("darkorange","purple","cyan4")) + labs(x = "Body mass (g)", y = "Frequency")

```

See @fig-penguins for an additional illustration.

```{r}
#| label: fig-plot
#| fig-cap: "Plot2"
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

ggplot(iris, aes(x=Petal.Length, y=Petal.Width)) +
  geom_point()
```
